existing_features.title: Replace the current single filter selector in the Discover filters sheet (the area that currently shows the “Filtrar por” label and dropdown) with three inputs shown in that same spot: (1) “Minimum category” with options 1st through 7th, (2) “Maximum category” with options 1st through 7th, and (3) “Zone” with an “All departments” option plus all Uruguay departments.
Add a reusable, explicit list of Uruguay departments for the Zone dropdown and ensure the dropdown renders them as selectable options (keeping “All departments” as the default).
Store the three filter selections in Discover screen state and pass them to the DiscoverFilters component so selections persist while opening/closing the sheet and can be changed independently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Filtros UI: replace current 'Filtrar por' area with fields for Categoria mínima (1era–7ma), Categoria máxima (1era–7ma), and Zona (all departments of Uruguay).

projectName: Update Discover Filters sheet to show min/max category and Uruguay department zone
